recipesJson.name: Waffle Me This #remixmonth
recipesJson.author: folkart
recipesJson.description:
Waffle Me This? This is my final version of Strawberry Waffle. As I mentioned in V1 of Strawberry Waffle, my local vape shop mixed this recipe and I fell in love with it when I first started vaping. It got too expensive for me to buy and that's when I began mixing. This was a riddle that I had to crack.....10 months later I finally think I have it where it needs to be.
. 
To celebrate "remix" month or "clone" month I'm releasing this recipe. 

This recipe has a nice Belgian waffle taste smothered in maple syrup and strawberry syrup with a slight hint of freshly whipped cream. It has a great full mouth feel and is perfect with a nice cup of your favorite coffee. You may want to lower the CAP Super Sweet to .25% if you want less sweetness, but I like it at .5%

Steep 5 days is best
Please comment, mix, and or rate,...it makes us all better mixers. Enjoy :-)

reviews.text: You done set the bar too high with your other recipes! Didn't reach out and knock me over. Still pretty damn good.

i wanted to let this steep and vape before i posted. well 3 days an 30ml later i can honestly say it is Devine. the maple is very prevalent and adds to the waffle to make this a very good vape. while I'm partly strawberry blind now i can still taste what it brings to the table. great job man

Loving this Waffle creation.  Perfect blend of all the flavors, after steeping.  Reminds me of going to Ihop, getting the Belgian Waffle with glazed strawberries and some maple syrup.  I taste all the flavors.  Delicious.

Wow!!! Off the scale I was a bit put off by the cereal 27 but let me tell you that was a excellent choice for this creation. Granted it needs atleast 48 hours to steep but its worth the wait 10 fold. It brings me back to that mom and pop dinner that serves homemade waffles top with strawberries drizzled with maple syrup and a touch of cream. Well done folkart. It will be part of my adv rotation. The more it steeps the better it gets. Thanks for the share. Vape on dude!!!!!
